verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In an interview with NPR last Friday] , [ARG0: Trump 's chief of staff John Kelly] [V: described] [ARG1: the illegal aliens pouring across our border in the most gentle manner imaginable] .

In an interview with NPR last Friday , Trump 's chief of staff John Kelly described [ARG1: the illegal aliens] [V: pouring] [ARGM-DIR: across our border] [ARGM-MNR: in the most gentle manner imaginable] .
